p_seccion_1_primero: We have been summoned by Prevercred to redesign and adapt to new technologies institutional web . Counting with its highly recognizable identity in the financial field , we decided to give it the importance it deserved for its sector.
p_seccion_1_segundo: The development time for this project was only one month , and decided to give it our best so that the result was optimal and functional.
p_seccion_3_parrafo: Develop a functional and attractive web in a short time . A website that should reflect the whole spirit of Prevercred , family, retirees , state employees have to see reflected . Language and visual elements had to keep the identity of Prevercred in all aspects and reach people in a simple and striking way at once .
p_seccion_5_parrafo1: We created a language faithful to the history of Prevercred , with his personality and able to reach the required public. We create original icons and characters , along with their different characters in new situations never before views.
p_seccion_5_parrafo2: The creative process was to determine a number of circumstances where the characters reflect us the service and the possibilities offered Prevercred its customers.
p_seccion_6_parrafo1: We developed a responsive , easy to navigate , fun and peppy web where every moment is important. We follow graphic guidelines necessary to achieve the goal. The combined aesthetics and brand identity distinguishes Prevercred stay , we developed a web capable of providing a significant additional value to the universe of the brand.
p_seccion_6_parrafo2: In a brand universe where the added value is the key to differentiation with other financial market . Therefore Prevercred distinguished.
